title: Mastering Controlled Variable Strategy (CVS): Experimental Design Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course for middle school students preparing for medical/legal/technical careers to strengthen experimental design skills in a simulation environment, integrating VR-based virtual labs and LMS-based collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between independent, dependent, and controlled variables in single-variable experimental designs with 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify and propose corrective measures for variable control errors in virtual experimental environments with 90% probability.
Learners can complete three consecutive successful variable-controlled experimental scenarios by applying an experimental design algorithm.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
